title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 50 - Protective Helmets For In-line Skaters, Bicyclists And Operators Of Scooters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 50 - Protective Helmets For In-line Skaters, Bicyclists And Operators Of Scooters

State Regulations
§ 50.1 - Helmet standards for bicyclists, in-line skaters and operators of scooters
§ 50.2 - Incorporation by reference

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 50

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215[a], 1238[2-a], [5- b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
